MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow affecting properties in Auldhill Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on an underground cable fault, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:20pm on Tuesday 20th April 2021.
